cli-parm.name: mswordfile
cli-parm.tip: Full path to the MsWord document (DOCX) or the ZIP holding one or more MsWord files

cli-parm.name: debug
cli-parm.tip: Yes if run in debug mode

cli-parm.name: owner
cli-parm.tip: The registered name of the owner of this model.

cli-parm.name: arguments
cli-parm.tip: Path of the properties file that should be included

cli-parm.name: task
cli-parm.tip: Specify if the model should be compiled or released. This option is only relevant when debugging.

cli-parm.name: forcecompile
cli-parm.tip: Specify if Imvertor should continue processing the model even when errors occur. This option is only relevant when debugging.

cli-parm.name: project
cli-parm.tip: Specify the project that the model is part of. This option is only relevant when debugging.

cli-parm.name: application
cli-parm.tip: The name of the model to be processed.

cli-parm.name: metamodel
cli-parm.tip: The metamodel the the model processed. This parameter is used only when Imvertor cannot decide on a valid metamodel name based on other criteria.
